title: The International Player About To Get Played
itunes:title: The International Player About To Get Played
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for nine years and I have been tapping my husband's phone and I’ve found out about his three-year international love affair. He is from Zambia and he came to Texas eleven years ago. One night we were tipsy and we opened up about a lot of stuff from our past. He told me about the one that got away................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for nine years and I have been tapping my husband's phone and I’ve found out about his three-year international love affair. He is from Zambia and he came to Texas eleven years ago. One night we were tipsy and we opened up about a lot of stuff from our past. He told me about the one that got away................................
